bioconda.name: mason
bioconda.summary: Mason is a collection of tools for the simulation of biological sequences.

biocontainers.name: mason
biocontainers.summary: A fast, feature-rich and hackable read simulator for the simulation of ngs and sanger data.

biotools.summary: A fast, feature-rich and hackable read simulator for the simulation of NGS and Sanger data.

bioschemas.name: Mason
bioschemas.summary: A fast, feature-rich and hackable read simulator for the simulation of NGS and Sanger data.
